data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is located in the top right corner of every page, with a consistent and noticeable appearance. It stands out against the background, making it easy for users to locate no matter where they are on the site.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions as the button is already prominently placed.

data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website. It should always be in a clear and noticeable spot so users can easily find it no matter where they are on the site. Additionally, users should be able to sign in using a combination of their username or email and password.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is prominently visible on each page. However, the login form does not indicate whether it accepts both username and email for login purposes.
data.suggestions: Consider adding a label or placeholder text indicating that users can sign in using either their username or email address.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users to recover forgotten passwords.
data.observation: The login form includes a 'Forgot your login details?' link, which users can click to recover their passwords.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions as the process is accessible and straightforward.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users who have forgotten their email addresses.
data.observation: The provided screenshots do not show any dedicated process for users who have forgotten their email addresses.
data.suggestions: Implement a user-friendly process for recovering forgotten email addresses, such as an additional link or instructions on the 'Forgot your login details?' page.

data.title: Ensure there is an option for users to 'Remember My Details'.
data.observation: The login form includes a 'Save username' checkbox, which allows users to remember their credentials for future visits.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions as the checkbox for remembering login details is already implemented.

data.title: Ensure the site features helpful error messaging that triggers only when fields are incorrectly input, ensuring users receive clear guidance to correct mistakes effectively.
data.observation: An error message appears when incorrect login details are entered, but it may not provide specific guidance on what was entered incorrectly.
data.suggestions: Refine error messaging to specify whether the username or password is incorrect to provide clearer guidance to users.

data.title: Ensure CAPTCHA or other anti-bot measures are implemented during sign-in to enhance security and prevent automated attacks, thereby safeguarding user accounts and maintaining the integrity of the login process.
data.observation: The screenshots do not show any CAPTCHA or other anti-bot security measures on the login form.
data.suggestions: Implement CAPTCHA or similar anti-bot measures to protect against automated attacks and enhance login security.

data.title: Ensure that error messaging is clear and concise, providing users with specific reasons for the error encountered and clear instructions on the next steps to resolve the issue effectively.
data.observation: The error message displayed when incorrect login details are entered is clear but not specific enough.
data.suggestions: Enhance error messages to provide specific details about which part of the login information is incorrect and suggest possible next steps to resolve the issue.
